alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orange (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 12:38PM EST until December 20 at 6:37PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire... Connecticut River At Wells River affecting Grafton, Orange and Caledonia Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River at Wells River. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Newbury Crossing Road floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:16 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 11.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
